entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who successfully mounts his broom, and he thinks that brooms can sense fear.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione's broom simply rolled over on the ground when she tried to mount it.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is nervous and frightened of being left on the ground, which causes him to push off his broom too early.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is the instructor who teaches the students how to mount their brooms and corrects their grips.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy has been doing it wrong for years, according to Madam Hooch.

relationships.description: Harry successfully mounts his broom with the help of Madam Hooch's instructions.
Hermione has a broom that simply rolled over on the ground when she tried to mount it.
Neville pushes off his broom too early, before Madam Hooch's whistle has blown.
Madam Hooch teaches Harry how to mount his broom and corrects his grip.
Madam Hooch corrects Malfoy's mistake in mounting his broom, telling him he has been doing it wrong for years.
